question: Did Rasulullah(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam)trimmed his beard.
answer:
QUESTION
One of my friend who has spent a lot of time in Jammat (Tabligh)in Abu Daubhi,and also he has Alhamdulillal reasonable knowledge of Deen told me that Rasulullah(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam)did not touch any razor or trimmed his beard in his life.Please advise me according to sharia. Jazak Allah
ANSWER


Share:
Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) had a fully grown beard uptil his
chest.

We have not come across any narration of Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi
Wasallam) trimming his beard.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
